SEARCH
Package Doctor.View

Class DoctorView

java.lang.Object
Doctor.View.DoctorView
public class DoctorView extends Object
DoctorView class provides the user interface and menu for doctor operations. Allows doctors to view and manage appointments, medical records, availability, and outcomes.

  • Constructor Details

    • DoctorView

      public DoctorView(Doctor doctor)
      Constructor for DoctorView.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor entity representing the logged-in doctor.

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Displays the main menu for the doctor. Allows navigation to various operations.

    • viewPatientMedicalRecords

      public void viewPatientMedicalRecords()
      Displays all medical records assigned to the logged-in doctor. Retrieves records using DoctorController.

    • updatePatientMedicalRecords

      public void updatePatientMedicalRecords()
      Allows the doctor to update medical records for a specific patient. Includes diagnosis and treatment plan updates.

    • viewPersonalSchedule

      public void viewPersonalSchedule()
      Displays the doctor's schedule for the next three days. Includes confirmed appointments and pending requests.

    • setAppointmentAvailability

      public void setAppointmentAvailability()
      Manages the doctor's availability for appointments. Includes options to add or remove leave.

    • handleAppointmentRequests

      public void handleAppointmentRequests()
      Handles pending appointment requests for the doctor. Allows the doctor to accept or decline requests.

    • viewUpcomingAppointments

      public void viewUpcomingAppointments()
      Displays the doctor's upcoming appointments. Includes confirmed appointments within the next three days.

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      public void recordAppointmentOutcome()
      Records the outcome of a confirmed appointment. Includes consultation notes, services provided, and optional prescription.
